オプション1: Star Man and the others arrived at the ruin.
Star Man and the others walked toward Trapezoid Man’s room.
There was a noise from inside the room.

When they peeked in, Trapezoid Man was just getting up.
He was gritting his teeth in pain.

"...
 These are the kids I mentioned earlier."

"It’s a pleasure to meet you."
"It’s a pleasure to meet you."
Star Man and the others handed the coconuts to Trapezoid Man.

After the introductions, Star Man and the others moved to another room.
It was full of dust and garbage, but they no longer had the energy or will to clean it.
"Let’s rest for now... I can’t do anything more today."
Star Man and the others decided to sleep for a while.
